context.content: "Speed" is a high-octane action film about a Los Angeles SWAT team specialist who must defuse a bomb on a city bus that will explode if the bus goes below 50 mph. It definitely has thrilling adventure as the characters race against time to save the passengers on the bus.
That sounds like a thrilling and action-packed movie. I'm glad it has the adventurous element too. I'll definitely watch "Speed"! [END]
